ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Designating the Minister of Infrastructure and Communities as the Minister for the Purposes of the Parliamentary Employment and Staff Relations Act
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2018-1203 of September 25, 2018; and (2) designating the MINISTER OF INFRASTRUCTURE AND COMMUNITIES as the Minister for the purposes of the PARLIAMENTARY EMPLOYMENT AND STAFF RELATIONS ACT.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2022-0003 Publication Date: 2022-02-02
